page.title: 16Hobbies and Interests
page.content: IN MY SPARE TIMR I DO LOTS OF THINGS. MOST OF THE TIME I PLAY ON MY BIKE WITH MY FRIENDS.I ALSO PLAY WITH MY "WORDSEARCHER".SOMETIMES I PLAY ON MY ORGAN AND I COMPOSE SONGS.MOST OF THE TIME I PLAY WITH MY "SPACE INVADER." SOMETIMES I GO ON THE GREEN AND HAVE A GAME OF FOOTBALL.ON SATURDAY MORNINGS I GO TO HARTLEPOOL SWIMMING BATHS AND PLAY WITH MY COUSIN AND THEN WE GO FOR SOMETHING TO EAT AT THE CAFE.AFTER WE HAVE EATEN WE GO ROUND TO THE MUSEUM.ON SUNDAY AFTERNOON'S I GO OVER TO THE PIT HEAP WITH MY COUSIN AND MAKE A CAMP AND PLAY FUN FIGHTS.SOME DAYS I TAKE MY DOG FOR A WALK.I SPEND SOME EVENINGS AT THE COMMUNITY COLLEGE PLAYING BOWLS AND FOOTBALL WITH STUART AND PAUL.THE COMMUNITY COLLEGE IS UP THE VILLAGE. TIMOTHY GIRVAN.
